T02D2299:228a-1: bh'a wa na kra ma sha ta n'a ma /
T02D2299:228a-3: bsgom rim drug pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2299:228a-4: bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2299:228a-5: dang po thugs brtse bla ma ste //
T02D2299:228a-6: bla ma'i mtshan nyid brtag par bya //
T02D2299:228a-7: rjes su bzung ba slob ma ste //
T02D2299:228a-8: bla mas kyang ni de bzhin btags //
T02D2299:228a-9: mtshan nyid kun ldan bla ma la //
T02D2299:228a-10: sgo gsum gus dang dngos po yis //
T02D2299:228a-11: zhen pa med par mchod byas la //
T02D2299:228a-12: khyim pa'i gnas sam dur khrod dam //
T02D2299:228a-13: shing gcig ci bde'i sa phyogs su //
T02D2299:228a-14: cho ga'i rim pa brtsam bya zhing //
T02D2299:228a-16: bar chod bsal phyir go cha bgo //
T02D2299:228a-17: tshogs chen rnam gnyis bsags pa'i phyir //
T02D2299:228b-0: bla ma @228b spyi bor rjes dran bya //
T02D2299:228b-1: dbang po gnyis kyi bye brag gis //
T02D2299:228b-2: dang po lta ba thag bcad de //
T02D2299:228b-3: ting 'dzin ngo bo brtag par bya //
T02D2299:228b-4: rtogs thob dus mnyam byung ma byung //
T02D2299:228b-5: rang dang bla ma'i nyams las shes //
T02D2299:228b-6: phyi rol spyod pa de bzhin shes //
T02D2299:228b-7: ma byung rigs pa nyams su blangs //
T02D2299:228b-8: ro snyoms bzhi la rim gyis bslab //
T02D2299:228b-9: yang na lus ngag yid gsum sbyangs //
T02D2299:228b-10: tha ma 'gro sar gtang bar bya //
T02D2299:228b-11: gal te dus mnyam byung ba na //
T02D2299:228b-12: gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum //
T02D2299:228b-13: brda yis phye la don du dril //
T02D2299:228b-14: gzhi gtan la 'bebs pa'i chos drug dang //
T02D2299:228b-15: gzhi smin par bya ba'i chos gsum dang //
T02D2299:228b-16: gzhi 'grol bar byed pa'i chos gsum ste //
T02D2299:228b-17: gzhi la brda chos bcu gnyis bstan //
T02D2299:228b-18: lam la nye dang ring ba dang //
T02D2299:228b-19: nye ring med pa'i lam dang gsum //
T02D2299:228b-20: re re la yang lnga lngar brtag / lnga gsum bco lnga lam gyi chos //
T02D2299:228b-21: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yang //
T02D2299:228b-22: sku bzhi rgyun chad med pa la //
T02D2299:228b-23: ngo bo bsam brjod bral ba ste //
T02D2299:228b-24: gdags bya sna tshogs mi 'gag ste //
T02D2299:228b-25: yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang //
T02D2299:228b-26: dpag bsam shing chen lta bu'o //
T02D2299:228b-27: bsgom rim drug pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2299:228b-28: sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa'i badzra p'a ni sa mdzad pa rdzogs so /
